Name: Featherfall Judgment
Title: Cyno: Featherfall Judgment
Source: Reward for inviting Cyno to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Featherfall Judgment
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1404]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1404] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S14042]</color> once.
When your $[A1404], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S14042]</color> while having at least 2 levels of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114041]</color>'s Indwelling effect, DMG dealt by <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S14042]</color> +1. (Max twice per Round)
(You must have $[A1404] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C114041.Name: Pactsworn Pathclearer
C114041.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Gain 1 level of Indwelling. If Indwelling Level is at least 8, decrease the Indwelling level by 6.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Indwelling grants the following effects based on its level</color>:
If equal to or greater than 2: $[K100] dealt is converted to $[K104];
If equal to or greater than 4: DMG dealt +2.

K100.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>
K100.Desc: Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.

K104.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>
K104.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Superconduct</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Quicken</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Catalyzing Field</color>] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG
